name: Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Kong instance. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: Datastore reachable
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if Kong is unable to connect to the datastore, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: Upstream target health status
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the target is unhealthy, otherwise returns `OK`.
